title: SpatialVID: A Large-Scale Video Dataset with Spatial Annotations
summary: This paper introduces SpatialVID, a large-scale video dataset with spatial annotations, addressing the scarcity of high-quality training data for spatial intelligence. It focuses on real-world dynamic scenes with ground-truth camera motion.
usefulness_reason: The title and summary clearly indicate the creation of a "Large-Scale Video Dataset with Spatial Annotations", which is highly relevant to the 'Contextual dataset' topic, especially with its spatial and dynamic scene focus.
